items.summary: This update refines the creator fee and revenue allocation system, introducing a new snapshot generation script for better tracking. These enhancements aim to provide clearer insights into creator earnings and streamline revenue management.

items.title: Fix ephone API balance calculation for currency conversion in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update resolves an issue with the ephone API where the balance was incorrectly displayed due to a change in the returned currency from RMB to USD. The calculation was updated to multiply the USD balance by 7 to convert it to RMB, ensuring accurate balance representation. Key changes were made in the balance.py file with minimal modifications, and thorough testing confirmed the fix.

items.title: Streamline Balance Check by Removing ephone.chat in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: The balance check function has been simplified by removing the fallback to the `ephone.chat` domain, ensuring that only `ephone.ai` is used for balance retrieval. This change reduces the function's complexity, cutting down the code from 26 lines to 18 while maintaining functionality. The update enhances performance and clarity in the balance fetching process.
